channel.title: Adding Music and Sounds [RENAMED/PI]
channel.description:
Ok, so I have a basic idea of how to do this (music not sounds).
I have all the client shit set up (a music player and all) and all I need help with is sounds and music. My idea for music is in the isInArea code, you set it to play that track. But I need to know how t do that. Please help out!
Add my MSN: xldarkwinglx@hotmail.com
